column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////Hi Kemi - Thanks for your review. Thursdays and Fridays do tend to be some of our busier nights
column2: and wait times can and have extended upwards of two hours at peak. So while I am pleased we were able to seat you quickly
column3: I do regret that you felt rushed in any way. I remind our front to slow things down a bit
column4: especially when the dining room (and the waiting list) fills up; however
column5: I would add that our servers operate with the assumption that guests have been waiting in the foyer or outside the venue for at least 20 minutes
column6: so they're hungry and ready to eat !
